idea-plugin.name: Zebra programming language (ZPL)
idea-plugin.description:
ZPL (Zebra programming language) support.

Used for printing labels

This plugin exposes two commands "Describe ZPL Command" and "ZPL Command. Quick Documentation". They allow easy checking of ZPL documentation.

The plugin works in any file type so that it can be used in templates as well. Not just in raw ZPL files.
